name: chorus-file-tools
description: Sandboxed file operations for Chorus agents

scripts.build: gren make FileToolsMain --output=build/file-tools-tmp && tail -n +2 build/file-tools-tmp > build/file-tools.js && bun build --compile build/file-tools.js --outfile build/file-tools && rm build/file-tools-tmp build/file-tools.js && gren make HandoffMain --output=build/handoff-tool-tmp && tail -n +2 build/handoff-tool-tmp > build/handoff-tool.js && bun build --compile build/handoff-tool.js --outfile build/handoff-tool && rm build/handoff-tool-tmp build/handoff-tool.js
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && npm run build:runner && ../integration-runner/build/runner tests/integration/file-tools build/file-tools && ../integration-runner/build/runner tests/integration/handoff-tool build/handoff-tool
